name: Fruit Hero (Sajjad Khan)
description:
I create this game for my 5 years old son (Sarrar). Its a very easy and short platformer game where player have to collect fruits to complete the level and also have to save himself from spikes, water and lava.

Controls Action Keyboard Game Boy Move Arrow Keys D-Pad Jump
ZA

It could be played on Web, Game Boy Emulator and Game Boy System.
